template.description: OFR template with mandatory field checks
template.name: OFR_Template_v2

entry.value: select distinct lower(server_id) as server_id, lower(server_hostname) as server_hostname, lower(server_localization) as server_localization, lower(server_model) as server_model, lower(cpu_model) as server_cpu, used_processor_sockets as server_processorNumber, core_per_processor as server_corePerProcessor, core_factor as corefactor_oracle, lower(hyperthreading) as hyperthreading, lower(owner) as owner, lower(cluster_name) as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE server_id <> '' AND server_hostname <> '' AND cpu_model <> '' AND used_processor_sockets <> '' AND core_per_processor <> '' AND core_factor <> ''

select distinct lower(application_id) as application_id, lower(application_name) as name, '' as version, '' as owner, lower(domaine) as domain from FLOWFILE WHERE application_id <> '' AND application_name <> ''

SELECT distinct product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_edition,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,'') as swidtag, lower(hostname_partition) as equipment_id, number_of_access as nbusers FROM FLOWFILE WHERE product_name <> '' AND hostname_partition <> ''

select distinct lower(application_instance_name) as instance_id, product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_edition,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,'') as swidtag FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_instance_name <> '' AND product_name <> ''

select distinct swidtag as swidtag, sku as sku, product_name as product_name, product_editor as editor, product_version as product_version, metric as metric, acquired_licenses as acquired_licenses, maintenance_licences as maintenance_licenses, unit_price as unit_price, maintenance_unit_price as maintenance_unit_price, "maintenance_start" as maintenance_start, "maintenance_end" as maintenance_end, unit_price * acquired_licenses as total_license_cost, maintenance_unit_price * maintenance_licences as total_maintenance_cost, unit_price * acquired_licenses + maintenance_unit_price * maintenance_licences as total_cost from FLOWFILE WHERE swidtag <> '' AND sku <> '' AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND product_version <> '' AND metric <> '' AND acquired_licenses <> '' AND unit_price <> ''
select distinct datacenter_name as datacenter_name from FLOWFILE
select distinct lower("vcenter_name") as vcenter_name, lower("vcenter_version") as vcenter_version from FLOWFILE WHERE vcenter_name <> ''
SELECT distinct lower(application_instance_name) as instance_id, lower(hostname_partition) as equipment_id FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_instance_name <> '' AND hostname_partition <> ''

SELECT distinct application_id as application_id, product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_edition,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,'') as swidtag FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_id <> '' AND product_name <> ''

select distinct lower("partition_id") as partition_id, lower("partition_hostname") as partition_hostname, lower("logical_cpu") as logical_cpu, lower("logical_cores") as logical_cores, lower("server_id") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE partition_id IS NOT NULL AND partition_id <> '' AND partition_hostname <> ''

select distinct lower(application_instance_name) as instance_id, lower(application_id) as application_id, lower(environment) as environment FROM FlOWFILE WHERE application_instance_name <> '' AND application_id <> ''

select distinct product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_edition,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,'') as swidtag, product_name as name, 'Oracle' as editor, product_version as version, product_edition as category, '' as IsOptionOf from FLOWFILE WHERE product_name <> '' AND product_version <> ''
select distinct lower("cluster_name") as cluster_name, lower("vcenter_name") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE cluster_name <> ''
